reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the promotion and development of an effective anti-money laundering system in China

description.narrative: This project is designed to draw on UK and international expertise to support the development of an effective anti-money laundering system in China, aligned with global standards set by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF), ahead of China's FATF evaluation in 2018-19. This project will develop recommendations for meeting FATF requirements by government and business through a National Action Plan. The project will also lay the groundwork for the multi-year Prosperity Fund Rule of Law for Business programme. A stronger anti-money laundering infrastructure will enhance sustainable and inclusive economic growth and lead to an improved business environment for international business, including for British companies. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
